snippet.title: Realm of the Ghost King - Final Trailer
snippet.description:
Available now for Mac and PC! Get it on Steam, itch.io or from the website!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/764370/Realm_of_the_Ghost_King/
https://mantiseyelabs.itch.io/rotgk
https://realmoftheghostking.com/buy

Realm of the Ghost King is a quick-play roguelike where you must battle your way through eight randomly generated dungeons to defeat the Ghost King and become the new king of the realm.

Learn more at the official website or follow along on Twitter: 

https://realmoftheghostking.com/

https://twitter.com/mantiseyelabs

The music is "Ice Cave" from "Songs from an Unmade World" by Visager:

https://visager.bandcamp.com/album/songs-from-an-unmade-world
https://twitter.com/visagermusic
